name: Gacha Garden (demo)
description:
In this relaxing idle / creative sandbox, drop your coins into the pot for a reward! Expand your ever growing item collection and use your imagination to create your own unique garden.

  • Mysterious creatures will bring you coins to spend
  • Wait for them to arrive or simply leave the game in the background.
  • No microtransactions!
  • Spend coins to discover plants, furniture, decorations & more.
  • Fill your collection with items from themed sets.
  • Stay organised by storing or selling your items.
  • Customise your garden with different lighting, weather and backgrounds.

This demo is also available on Steam!
Currently part of Steam Next Fest June 2022.
